about_the_game:
Start a journey toward the mythical kingdom Natsai in this strategic roguelike deck building game.
Try to outsmart your opponents while playing three moves into the future, Obtain powerful cards and items, and fight your way to Natsai!

Features



  • Play Ahead Of Time:
    Choose cards to play as your future self while trying to predict your opponent moves and counter them. You can move, attack, activate effects, summon creatures and more.

  • Tile Based Arena:
    Position and rotation matters, be aware of your opponent moves and position yourself to your benefit.

  • Dynamic Deck Building:
    Choose your cards wisely! Discover a variety of cards to add to your deck as you progress on your journey to Natsai, make the best deck you can, you'll need it to reach your destination.

  • An Ever-changing Journey:
    Your journey will never be the same. Choose your path, equip yourself with magic items, face different enemies, build a wild decks, and fight epic bosses!


    Will you be able to conquer the obstacles in your path and reach the legendary kingdom of Natsai? Only time will tell.

name: Journey to Natsai

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Start a journey toward the mythical kingdom Natsai in this strategic roguelike deck building game. Try to outsmart your opponents while playing three moves into the future, Obtain powerful cards and items, and fight your way to Natsai!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
